definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Scuffing the ball, she says, disrupts the already turbulent external airflow.
sentences.chinese: 她說，將球進行打磨，來擾動不穩定的外部氣流。

sentences.english: Absorption is also dependent upon air flow rates and the partial pressure of the gases in the inspired air.
sentences.chinese: 吸收也取決於空氣流速和吸入空氣中的氣體分壓。

sentences.english: Open doors can provide enough draft so that a fire can run wild.
sentences.chinese: 打開門會提供足夠的氣流更會使火勢蔓延。

sentences.english: Belling out the end of the tube will permit a freer passage of air.
sentences.chinese: 把管端做成鐘口狀可使氣流更暢通。

sentences.english: The positive and negative charges are then separated by updrafts and gravity, producing the electric field.
sentences.chinese: 正負電荷受上升氣流與重力的影響而分離，產生電場。

sentences.english: Currents of warm air keep the hang-gliders aloft.
sentences.chinese: 懸掛式滑翔機藉着暖氣流在高空飛行。

sentences.english: Combat that with a small fan on your desk that will help keep air circulating in your workspace.
sentences.chinese: 要解決它可以用一個小風扇助你周圍空氣流通。

sentences.english: The wind tower is a system for capturing air currents with openings at the top facing the prevailing winds.
sentences.chinese: 風塔是一種頂部開口，面向主風，捕捉氣流的系統。

sentences.english: Also note air flow is from right to left.
sentences.chinese: 也要注意，空氣流是從右到左的。

sentences.english: The Qi of meridian infuses into the shallow depression of the elbow like water flowing into a marsh.
sentences.chinese: 經氣流注至此，入曲肘淺凹處，猶如水進沼澤。

sentences.english: Peak updraft strength is slightly enhanced with hodograph curvature.
sentences.chinese: 山頂上升氣流強度隨速矢端跡曲率加大而稍有加強。

sentences.english: The results show that improved hole is more advantageous to the radial mixing of gas stream.
sentences.chinese: 對比結果表明，橋孔比圓孔更有利氣流的徑向擴散。

sentences.english: The air jet weaving machine employs the air picking-up, its weaving technology consisting in small shedding and large tension.
sentences.chinese: 噴氣織機採用氣流引緯，其織造工藝爲小開口大張力。

sentences.english: However, their permeability and airflow resistance may increase if they become wet.
sentences.chinese: 然而，若其變溼，其通透性及氣流阻力可能增大。

sentences.english: Presents a method to measure the wind velocity with the thermistor as the velocity sensor.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種用球形熱敏電阻測量氣流速度的方法。

sentences.english: Could you help me adjust the air flow? It is blowing right on me.
sentences.chinese: 你能幫我調整一下空調氣流嗎？它吹着我的頭了。

definition: surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to affect/to produce a change in sth
to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
